Objective: OBJ1 - Strengthen & Protect Western Hemisphere Partnership Network

Sea: Define maritime intel inputs, AIS feeds, and liaison roles
Air: Define air ISR inputs (P-8/P-3/MQ-9) and ATO links
Cyber: Design secure networks, classification rules, cross-domain solutions
Space: Plan SATCOM, space ISR feeds, and archival policies
Decisive_Point: Fusion cell framework agreed and resourced
Decision_Point: Decision to stand up JIFC-HEM with specific partners

Decisive_Point: Partners routinely sharing and receiving actionable intel
Decision_Point: Partner begins withholding or downgrading shared intelligence
